To send cryptocurrency to another Ndax user using the Ndax mobile app, follow these steps:

  1. Log in to the Ndax app.
  2. On the bottom navigation bar, tap the Ndax logo.
  3. Select Send.
  4. Enter the recipient’s email address associated with their Ndax account.
  5. Enter a message for the recipient (optional).
  6. Check Send as a Gift if this is intended as a gift.
  7. Select an event from the drop-down menu (required when sending as a gift).
  8. Tap Continue.
  9. Select the cryptocurrency you want to send.
  10. Enter the amount to send, or choose a percentage of your balance.
  11. Tap Confirm.
  12. Review the transfer details, then tap Send.
  13. Enter your six-digit 2FA code from your authenticator app.

✅ The recipient will receive an email notification that you’ve sent them funds.
If the email does not match an existing Ndax account, they will receive an invitation to sign up.
Once they register, the funds will appear in their account in a pending state. They will not be able to buy, sell, deposit, or withdraw the funds until they are fully verified.
